description: Adds a new access control rule for the specified organization. The rule allows or denies access to the organization for the specified IPv4 addresses, access protocol actions, user IDs and impersonation IDs. Adding a new rule with the same name as an existing rule replaces the older rule.

parameters.name: IpRanges
parameters.description: IPv4 CIDR ranges to include in the rule. (string) ---

parameters.name: NotIpRanges
parameters.description: IPv4 CIDR ranges to exclude from the rule. (string) ---

parameters.name: Actions
parameters.description: Access protocol actions to include in the rule. Valid values include ActiveSync, AutoDiscover, EWS, IMAP, SMTP, WindowsOutlook, and WebMail. (string) ---

parameters.name: NotActions
parameters.description: Access protocol actions to exclude from the rule. Valid values include ActiveSync, AutoDiscover, EWS, IMAP, SMTP, WindowsOutlook, and WebMail. (string) ---

parameters.name: UserIds
parameters.description: User IDs to include in the rule. (string) ---

parameters.name: NotUserIds
parameters.description: User IDs to exclude from the rule. (string) ---

parameters.name: ImpersonationRoleIds
parameters.description: Impersonation role IDs to include in the rule. (string) ---

parameters.name: NotImpersonationRoleIds
parameters.description: Impersonation role IDs to exclude from the rule. (string) ---
